thread.section_title: ADS Sports Eyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ADS Sports Eyewear | adseyewear.com
thread.title: skier2017
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by skier2017

author: skier2017
title: skier2017
text: Both of my pairs of Smith Prophecy Goggle's had the foam deteriorate on the top vents due to age I guess as they were in hand luggage and when I arrived in Zermatt, Switzerland so improvised with one pair and when I came back I needed new goggles but insurance only pays if you have new RX inserts. So ADS Sports Eyewear was having a sale and the selection of lens were awesome. I was able to order a new RX insert with ease. I talked to CS a couple of times with questions and they were always prompt in replies and very helpful and even let me know when they were shipping to me as my company changed the policy and needed to know tracking number so I could get when they arrived. The goggles came and it was everything that was supposed to be with no surprises! The even came with even a nicer case than own that was included for free with order.
